+1 (123) 456-7890: Placeholder for phone number input field
1 comment: Comment count displayed above the comments section in case there is only one

Account: A label in Portal for your account area
Account settings: A label in Portal for your account settings
Add a personal note: Becomes the field label for donations in Stripe

Anonymous: Comment placed by a member without a name
Are you sure?: Asks the user to confirm deleting a comment
Back: A button to return to the previous page
Back to Log in: A button to return to the login screen

Billing info: A label for the user billing information section
A label explaining that the trial can be cancelled at any time
Cancel subscription: A button to cancel a paid subscription
Cancellation reason: A textarea inviting members who are publishing to share feedback with the publisher
Change: A button to change the current plan
Change plan: Header for the change plan screen in Portal
Check spam & promotions folders: A section title in email receiving FAQ

Check your inbox to verify email update: Displayed when members change email addresses in Portal
Choose: A button to select a plan
Choose a different plan: A button for members to switch between plans
Choose a plan: Header for the plan selection screen in Portal
Choose your newsletters: A title for a screen where members can choose which email newsletters to receive
Click here to retry: A link to retry the login process
Close: A button to close or dismiss portal and other UI components
Comment: Button text to post your comment, on smaller devices
Shown when a user changes preferences in Portal
Comments: A title for the comments section on a post

Complete your profile: Title of the modal to edit your expertise in the comments app
Complete your sign up to {{siteTitle}}!: Title on confirmation screen of signup process, indicating that it is not yet complete
Complimentary: Label of a paid plan which has been added to a member's account for free
Confirm cancellation: A button to confirm the cancellation of a subscription
Confirm email address: Title for a modal for confirming. As the modal calls for action, the imperative form shall be used
Confirm signup: A link to confirm the email in signup
Confirm subscription: Button to confirm the change to a new plan
Confirm your email address: Subject of the confirmation email sent to members
Confirm your email update for {{siteTitl: A message about confirming a change to a member's email adress
Confirm your subscription to {{siteTitle: Double opt-in message for new signups
Contact support: Button to send an email to support
Continue subscription: Button to continue a (cancelled) paid subscription

Message when a login link has expired
Message when an email update link is invalid
Create a new contact: A section title in email receiving FAQ
Delete account: A button for members to delete their account

Deleting: Shown while a comment deletion is in progress

Discussion: Short default title for the comments section used on smaller devices
Don't have an account?: A link on the login screen, directing people who do not yet have an account to sign up.
Edit: A button to edit the user profile

Email: A label for email address input
Email newsletter: Title for the email newsletter settings

Shown when a member updates email preferences
Email sent: Button text after being clicked, when an email has been sent to confirm a new subscription. Should be short.

Sign in to {{siteTitle}}: The title displayed on the login screen

Error message when subscribing to a newsletter fails in the signup form embed

Title of a page when an error occured while submitting feedback

Thank you for subscribing to {{siteTitle: A success message, confirming that a member has 'subscribed' to a newsletter
A success message, confirming that a member has 'subscribed' to a newsletter

This is in the footer of signup verification emails, and comes right after 'If you did not make this request, you can simply delete this message.'

Unsubscribed: Status of a newsletter which a user has not subscribed to

Update: A button to update the billing information
Update your preferences: A button for updating member preferences in their account area

Appears in the call to action

View in browser: Link in the newsletter header taking the user to the website

Welcome back!: A message when a user has logged in successfully
Welcome back! Use this link to securely: Descriptive text in login emails, displayed right before the button used to log in

Welcome to {{siteTitle}}: Greeting to user on recommendation page
When an inbox fails to accept an email i: A paragraph from the email suppression FAQ
Why has my email been disabled?: A section title from the email suppression FAQ
Yearly: A label indicating an annual payment cadence
You are receiving this because you are a: Shown at the bottom of the newsletter.  Status will be one of free/paid/trialing/complimentary - see those strings below.

You currently have a free membership, up: A message indicating that the member is using a free subcription, and could access more content with a paid subscription
You have been successfully resubscribed: A confirmation message when a member has had emails turned off, but they have been successfully turned back on
You will not be signed up, and no accoun: Descriptive text in signup emails indicating that if someone does NOT click on the confirmation button, then they will not be signed up to anything. This text is intended to reassure people who receive a signup confirmation email that they did not ask for.
Descriptive text in signup emails indicating that if someone does NOT click on the confirmation button, then they will not be signed up to anything. This text is intended to reassure people who receive a signup confirmation email that they did not ask for.
You're currently not receiving emails: Message for user who have newsletters disabled
You're not receiving emails: Shorter message for user who have newsletters disabled, for mobile devices
You're not receiving emails because you: An error message displayed in the member account area when newsletter delivery to their address has repeatedly failed or they have marked an email as spam.
You're one tap away from subscribing to: Descriptive text displayed in signup emails, with language focused on 'subscribing' to a newsletter and confirming their email address
A notification displayed when the user signs in
You've successfully subscribed to: A notification displayed when the user subscribed
Your account: A label indicating member account details
Your email address: Placeholder text in an input field
Your input helps shape what gets publish: Descriptive text displayed on the member feedback UI, telling people how their feedback is used

Subscription status, included at the bottom of newsletters
Appears in the newsletter footer, be sure to include {date} in the translation.
Your subscription will expire on {{expir: A message indicating when the member's subscription will expire, in the portal
Appears in the newsletter footer, be sure to include {date} in the translation.
Your subscription will renew on {{renewa: A message indicating when the member's subscription will be renewed, in the portal
Your subscription will start on {{subscr: A message for trial users indicating when their subscription will start
complimentary: Will be substituted into status for 'You are receiving this because you are a %%{status}%% subscriber to {site}.'
free: Will be substituted into status for 'You are receiving this because you are a %%{status}%% subscriber to {site}.'
paid: Will be substituted into status for 'You are receiving this because you are a %%{status}%% subscriber to {site}.'
trialing: Will be substituted into status for 'You are receiving this because you are a %%{status}%% subscriber to {site}.'
{date}: This will appear at the top of the newsletter, as the publication date. No changes needed, usually.
{{amount}} characters left: Characters left, shown above the input field, when editing your expertise in the comments app
{{amount}} comments: Amount of comments on a post
{{amount}} days free: A label for an offer, explaining how long the trial is
{{amount}} hrs ago: how long (in hours) since a comment was posted
{{amount}} mins ago: how long in minutes since a comment was posted
{{amount}} more: how many more comments are present in the list, when paginated
{{amount}} off: A label for an offer, explaining how much the discount is for
{{amount}} off for first {{number}} mont: A label for an offer, explaining how many months are discounted
A label for an offer, explaining how long the discount is for (either first month or year)
A label for an offer, explaining that the discounted rate applies forever
{{memberEmail}} will no longer receive e: A message shown when a user unsubscribes from comment replies
{{memberEmail}} will no longer receive t: A message shown when a user unsubscribes from a newsletter
{{memberEmail}} will no longer receive {: A message shown when a user unsubscribes from a newsletter
{{trialDays}} days free: A label for free trial days
